alert.note: Alert for Bailey; Cochran; Hockley; Lamb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 9:48AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bailey, northeastern Cochran, northwestern Hockley and southern Lamb Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 948 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pep, or 13 miles northeast of Morton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Littlefield, Sudan, Amherst, Fieldton, Pep and Bula. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
